alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 7:41PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nash, southwestern Edgecombe and northeastern Wilson Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Bailey, or 8 miles southwest of Nashville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Nashville, Wilson, Elm City, Sharpsburg, Spring Hope, Tar River Reservoir, Willbanks and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
